This informs the type of RNA-extraction before RNA-seq

TCGA_notes:
auc / mapped_read_count * ifelse(paired_end, 2, 1) 
Calculating read length from auc, mapped read count, and number of ends
TCGA is not in SRA, as such this is the case ID instead of the project ID

Description: Brodmann area for tissue from cerebral cortex - (1-52)

TCGA_notes: The youngest GBM/LGG individual is 14, therefore individuals can be adult or adolescent. Developmental stage is based on age
GTEx_notes: The youngest individual is older than 20, therefore everyone is an adult
0 = ventilator, 1 = violent & fast death, 2 = fast but natural, 3 = ill but unexpected, 4 = ill and expected.
